TopicTitle: What If we Made alot of Labs with Blimps???

Articles.Content:
I have made a Mobile lab with only using a blimp can you guys make mobile lab without using fuel?

(YOU MAY USE FUEL IF YOU CANT FIND A WAY TO GET A MOBILE BLIMP BASE I COUDENT ETHIER SO I JUST MADE A ORBIT LAB BASE )

Edited September 15, 2013 by BattleDroid Commander

Wrong section, this should probably be in the Challenges section.

Also, please inform the readers what mod they will be using for blimps?
Does it count as using fuel if we are using it to create an explosion which will propel the lab (sans fuel) into the air?
